Login.DownloadText: For a better experience download the desktop application for Windows or for Mac
Login.WelcomeText: Welcome to the European Aerosols Iberia B2B store. If you do not have a password, contact us at +34 977 677 305 or by sending an email to novasol@novasolspray.com.

Order.Description: References organized by ranges. Only full boxes accepted.
Order.Title: New order

Confirm.Description: For any change of invoicing, contact us at +34 977 677 305 or send an email to novasol@novasolspray.com .
Confirm.Title: Confirming order

Done.Description: We will contact you shortly to confirm the shipping date and send you the legal invoice.
Done.Title: Your order has been sent successfully

NewPassword.Checkbox: I agree to the Terms of Use, Cookie Policy, sending news and offers. *
NewPassword.Description: Enter the password you will use to access our service, once completed we will redirect you to the login page to enter your email and the new password to access.
NewPassword.ErrorCookies: You must accept our Terms of Use, cookie policy, sending news and offers.
NewPassword.ErrorToken: The token is incorrect, contact us to request a new one
NewPassword.NoToken: You need a valid token to change the password, contact us at +34 977 677 305 or by sending an email to novasol@novasolspray.com.
